title: Gapee
content:
Hallo,   
My first attempt in producing a text typeface is called gapee. I needed some gap to fill and thougt the word gap itself would sound a bit boring for a typeface.   
   
Thanks for your critique   
   
Dominik B
author: golfomat

comments.content:
Hallo Again, I've changed some things (hopefully to the better). And I improved presentation a bit. I'd appreciate you commenting on the font since I don't have "the bedrock of undersatnding" yet. Thanks Dominik

swf of gapee
